blocks.content: An integer divides another iff it divides their sum. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 31-Mar-2011.)

blocks.name: dvdssub
blocks.content: An integer divides another iff it divides their difference. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 31-Mar-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm dvdssub(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c0, cmin, c1))))
} = {
  3bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c0, cmin, c1)), wbr(c0, cdvds, cneg(c1)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1))))
  dvdsnegb(c0, c1)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, cneg(c1)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)))), wcel(cneg(c1), cz))
  znegcl(c1)
  dvdsadd(c0, cneg(c1))
  breq2d(c0, cdvds, co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), co(c0, cmin, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), co(c0, cmin, c1)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  zcn(c0)
  zcn(c1)
  negsub(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: dvdssubr
blocks.content: An integer divides another iff it divides their difference. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 31-Mar-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm dvdssubr(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c0))))
} = {
  bitr2d(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c0)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cmin, c0))))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cmin, c0)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cmin, c0)))), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c0), cz))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c0), cz))
  zsubcl(c1, c0)
  dvdsadd(c0, co(c1, cmin, c0))
  breq2d(c0, cdvds, co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cmin, c0)), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wceq(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cmin, c0)), c1), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  zcn(c0)
  zcn(c1)
  pncan3(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: dvdsadd2b
blocks.content: Adding a multiple of the base does not affect divisibility. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm dvdsadd2b(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))), wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1))))
} = {
  impbida(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1)))
  syl32anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1)), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1))
  simpl3l(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1))
  simpl2(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1))
  simpl3r(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1))
  simpr(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1))
  imp(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, c2), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1)))
  dvds2add(c0, c2, c1)
  breqtrd(c0, cdvds, c1, co(co(c2, caddc, c1), caddc, cneg(c2)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1))))
  syl32anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(co(c2, caddc, c1), caddc, cneg(c2))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c2, caddc, c1), cz), wcel(cneg(c2), cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1)), wbr(c0, cdvds, cneg(c2)))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1)), wcel(co(c2, caddc, c1), cz))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))), wcel(co(c2, caddc, c1), cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1)), wcel(cneg(c2), cz))
  znegcld(c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))))
  simp3l(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))
  simpr(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1)))
  mpbid(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wbr(c0, cdvds, cneg(c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))
  simpl3r(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1)))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, c2), wbr(c0, cdvds, cneg(c2))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c2, cz))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1)))
  dvdsnegb(c0, c2)
  imp(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c2, caddc, c1), cz), wcel(cneg(c2), cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1)), wbr(c0, cdvds, cneg(c2))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(co(c2, caddc, c1), caddc, cneg(c2))))
  dvds2add(c0, co(c2, caddc, c1), cneg(c2))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(co(co(c2, caddc, c1), caddc, cneg(c2)), c1), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz))
  simpl2(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1)))
  simpl3l(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1)))
  eqtrd(co(co(c2, caddc, c1), caddc, cneg(c2)), c1, co(co(c2, caddc, c1), cmin, c2), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)))
  negsubd(co(c2, caddc, c1), c2, wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)))
  zcnd(co(c2, caddc, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)))
  ancoms(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(co(c2, caddc, c1), cz))
  zaddcl(c2, c1)
  pncan2d(c2, c1, wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)))
  adantl(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c2, cc))
  zcn(c2)
  adantr(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cc))
  zcn(c1)
}

blocks.name: dvdsaddre2b
blocks.content: Adding a multiple of the base does not affect divisibility. Variant of ~ dvdsadd2b only requiring ` B ` to be a real number (not necessarily an integer). (Contributed by AV, 19-Jul-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dvdsaddre2b(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))), wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1))))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))), wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1)))), wcel(c1, cz))
  com12(wcel(c1, cz), w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))), wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1))))
  3imp(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wi(wcel(c1, cz), wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1)))))
  com24(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wcel(c1, cz), wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1))))
  3exp(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wi(wcel(c1, cr), wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1)))))
  a1d(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))), wcel(c1, cr), wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1))))
  dvdsadd2b(c0, c1, c2)
  ex(wn(wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))), wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1))))
  impbid(wa(wn(wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)))), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1)))
  adantr(wn(wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))), wi(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1))))
  com12(wn(wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1)))
  simpl2im(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wi(wn(wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  dvdszrcl(c0, c1)
  pm2.24(wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1)))
  com12(wa(wn(wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1))
  simpl2im(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c2, caddc, c1)), wi(wa(wn(wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)))), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1)), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c2, caddc, c1), cz))
  dvdszrcl(c0, co(c2, caddc, c1))
  com12(wcel(co(c2, caddc, c1), cz), wa(wn(wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)))), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1))
  impcom(wn(wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))), wi(wcel(co(c2, caddc, c1), cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1)))
  3imp(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wi(wn(wcel(c1, cz)), wi(wcel(co(c2, caddc, c1), cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1))))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cz), wi(wcel(c1, cr), wi(wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wi(wn(wcel(c1, cz)), wi(wcel(co(c2, caddc, c1), cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1))))))
  com12(wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wi(wn(wcel(c1, cz)), wi(wcel(co(c2, caddc, c1), cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1))))
  adantr(wcel(c2, cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2), wi(wcel(c1, cr), wi(wn(wcel(c1, cz)), wi(wcel(co(c2, caddc, c1), cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1)))))
  syl8(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cr), wn(wcel(c1, cz)), wi(wcel(co(c2, caddc, c1), cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1)), wn(wcel(co(c2, caddc, c1), cz)))
  exp32(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cr), wn(wcel(c1, cz)), wn(wcel(co(c2, caddc, c1), cz)))
  eqneltrd(co(c2, caddc, c1), cz, co(c1, caddc, c2), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wn(wcel(c1, cz)))))
  addcomd(c2, c1, wa(wcel(c2, cz), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wn(wcel(c1, cz)))))
  adantr(wcel(c2, cz), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wn(wcel(c1, cz))), wcel(c2, cc))
  zcn(c2)
  ad2antrl(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cr), wn(wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c1, cc))
  recn(c1)
  imp(wcel(c2, cz), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wn(wcel(c1, cz))), wn(wcel(co(c1, caddc, c2), cz)))
  syl5bir(wcel(c2, cz), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wn(wcel(c1, cz))), wn(wcel(co(c1, caddc, c2), cz)), wcel(c1, cdif(cr, cz)))
  eldif(c1, cr, cz)

  eldifbd(co(c1, caddc, c2), cz, cr, wa(wcel(c1, cdif(cr, cz)), wcel(c2, cz)))
  nzadd(c1, c2)
  pm2.21(wcel(co(c2, caddc, c1), cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1))
}

blocks.name: fsumdvds
blocks.content: If every term in a sum is divisible by ` N ` , then so is the sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumdvds(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cdvds, csu(s0, c1, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61dane(c0, nat0, w0, wbr(c0, cdvds, csu(s0, c1, c2)))
  3brtr4d(c0, cdvds, csu(s0, c1, c2), nat0, nat0, wa(w0, wceq(c0, nat0)))
  mp1i(wa(w0, wceq(c0, nat0)), wbr(nat0, cdvds, nat0), wcel(nat0, cz))
  0z()
  dvds0(nat0)
  simpr(w0, wceq(c0, nat0))
  eqtrd(csu(s0, c1, c2), nat0, csu(s0, c1, nat0), wa(w0, wceq(c0, nat0)))
  sumeq2dv(s0, c1, c2, nat0, wa(w0, wceq(c0, nat0)))
  mpbid(wa(wa(w0, wceq(c0, nat0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(c2, nat0), wbr(nat0, cdvds, c2))
  eqbrtrrd(nat0, cdvds, c2, c0, wa(wa(w0, wceq(c0, nat0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  simplr(w0, wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  adantlr(w0, wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wceq(c0, nat0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wb(wbr(nat0, cdvds, c2), wceq(c2, nat0)), wcel(c2, cz))
  adantlr(w0, wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c2, cz))
  0dvds(c2)
  syl(wa(w0, wceq(c0, nat0)), wceq(csu(s0, c1, nat0), nat0), wo(wss(c1, cfv(cuz, nat0)), wcel(c1, cfn)))
  olcd(wa(w0, wceq(c0, nat0)), wss(c1, cfv(cuz, nat0)), wcel(c1, cfn))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c1, cfn))
  sumz(s0, c1, nat0)
  mpbird(wa(w0, wne(c0, nat0)), wbr(c0, cdvds, csu(s0, c1, c2)), wcel(co(csu(s0, c1, c2), cdiv, c0), cz))
  eqeltrd(co(csu(s0, c1, c2), cdiv, c0), cz, csu(s0, c1, co(c2, cdiv, c0)), wa(w0, wne(c0, nat0)))
  fsumdivc(s0, c1, c2, c0, wa(w0, wne(c0, nat0)))
  zcnd(c0, wa(w0, wne(c0, nat0)))
  zcnd(c2, wa(wa(w0, wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  fsumzcl(s0, c1, co(c2, cdiv, c0), wa(w0, wne(c0, nat0)))
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, nat0), wcel(c1, cfn))
  mpbid(wa(wa(w0, wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(co(c2, cdiv, c0), cz), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))
  adantlr(w0, wne(c0, nat0), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(w0, wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, c2), wcel(co(c2, cdiv, c0), cz)), wcel(c0, cz), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(c2, cz))
  adantr(wa(w0, wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c0, cz))
  simplr(w0, wne(c0, nat0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  adantlr(w0, wne(c0, nat0), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c2, cz))
  dvdsval2(c0, c2)
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wne(c0, nat0)), wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, csu(s0, c1, c2)), wcel(co(csu(s0, c1, c2), cdiv, c0), cz)), wcel(c0, cz), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(csu(s0, c1, c2), cz))
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, nat0), wcel(c0, cz))
  simpr(w0, wne(c0, nat0))
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, nat0), wcel(csu(s0, c1, c2), cz))
  fsumzcl(s0, c1, c2, w0)
  dvdsval2(c0, csu(s0, c1, c2))
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wceq(c0, nat0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, nat0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wne(c0, nat0))
  diff.wne.s(s0, c0, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fsumdvds(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[||]sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c0[||]c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61dane(c0, nat0, w0, c0[||]sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2))
  3brtr4d(c0, cdvds, sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2), nat0, nat0, (w0 ∧ c0 = 0))
  mp1i((w0 ∧ c0 = 0), 0[||]0, 0 ∈ ℤ)
  0z()
  dvds0(nat0)
  simpr(w0, c0 = 0)
  eqtrd(sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2), nat0, sum(s0 ∈ c1, 0), (w0 ∧ c0 = 0))
  sumeq2dv(s0, c1, c2, nat0, (w0 ∧ c0 = 0))
  mpbid(((w0 ∧ c0 = 0)∧ s0 ∈ c1), c2 = 0, 0[||]c2)
  eqbrtrrd(nat0, cdvds, c2, c0, ((w0 ∧ c0 = 0)∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  simplr(w0, c0 = 0, s0 ∈ c1)
  adantlr(w0, c0 = 0, s0 ∈ c1, c0[||]c2)
  syl(((w0 ∧ c0 = 0)∧ s0 ∈ c1), (0[||]c2 ↔ c2 = 0), c2 ∈ ℤ)
  adantlr(w0, c0 = 0, s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ ℤ)
  0dvds(c2)
  syl((w0 ∧ c0 = 0), sum(s0 ∈ c1, 0)= 0, (c1 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` 0)∨ c1 ∈ Fin))
  olcd((w0 ∧ c0 = 0), c1 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` 0), c1 ∈ Fin)
  adantr(w0, c0 = 0, c1 ∈ Fin)
  sumz(s0, c1, nat0)
  mpbird((w0 ∧ c0 ≠ 0), c0[||]sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2), (sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2)[÷]c0)∈ ℤ)
  eqeltrd((sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2)[÷]c0), cz, sum(s0 ∈ c1,(c2[÷]c0)), (w0 ∧ c0 ≠ 0))
  fsumdivc(s0, c1, c2, c0, (w0 ∧ c0 ≠ 0))
  zcnd(c0, (w0 ∧ c0 ≠ 0))
  zcnd(c2, ((w0 ∧ c0 ≠ 0)∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  fsumzcl(s0, c1, (c2[÷]c0), (w0 ∧ c0 ≠ 0))
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ 0, c1 ∈ Fin)
  mpbid(((w0 ∧ c0 ≠ 0)∧ s0 ∈ c1), (c2[÷]c0)∈ ℤ, c0[||]c2)
  adantlr(w0, c0 ≠ 0, s0 ∈ c1, c0[||]c2)
  syl3anc(((w0 ∧ c0 ≠ 0)∧ s0 ∈ c1), (c0[||]c2 ↔(c2[÷]c0)∈ ℤ), c0 ∈ ℤ, c0 ≠ 0, c2 ∈ ℤ)
  adantr((w0 ∧ c0 ≠ 0), s0 ∈ c1, c0 ∈ ℤ)
  simplr(w0, c0 ≠ 0, s0 ∈ c1)
  adantlr(w0, c0 ≠ 0, s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ ℤ)
  dvdsval2(c0, c2)
  syl3anc((w0 ∧ c0 ≠ 0), (c0[||]sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2)↔(sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2)[÷]c0)∈ ℤ), c0 ∈ ℤ, c0 ≠ 0, sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2)∈ ℤ)
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ 0, c0 ∈ ℤ)
  simpr(w0, c0 ≠ 0)
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ 0, sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2)∈ ℤ)
  fsumzcl(s0, c1, c2, w0)
  dvdsval2(c0, sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2))
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, c0 = 0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, nat0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, c0 ≠ 0)
  diff.wne.s(s0, c0, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
}

thm dvdslelem(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

} = {

  mpi(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wo(wbr(co(c2, cmul, c1), clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, co(c2, cmul, c1))), wo(wbr(c2, cle, nat0), wbr(nat1, cle, c2)))

  orim12d(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c2, cle, nat0), wbr(nat1, cle, c2), wbr(co(c2, cmul, c1), clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, co(c2, cmul, c1)))
  syl6(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c2, cle, nat0), wbr(co(c2, cmul, c1), clt, c0), wbr(co(c2, cmul, c1), cle, nat0))
  syl6ibr(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c2, cle, nat0), wbr(co(c2, cmul, c1), cle, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cneg(c2), cmul, c1)))

  ax-mp(wb(wbr(c2, cle, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c2))), wcel(c2, cr))

  mulge0i(cneg(c2), c1)
  renegcli(c2)
  bitr4i(wbr(co(c2, cmul, c1), cle, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cneg(c2), cmul, c1)), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(co(c2, cmul, c1))))
  ax-mp(wb(wbr(co(c2, cmul, c1), cle, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(co(c2, cmul, c1)))), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c1), cr))
  le0neg1(co(c2, cmul, c1))
  breq2i(nat0, cle, co(cneg(c2), cmul, c1), cneg(co(c2, cmul, c1)))
  mulneg1i(c2, c1)
  recni(c2)
  recni(c1)
  mpan2(wbr(co(c2, cmul, c1), cle, nat0), wbr(co(c2, cmul, c1), clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))
  lelttri(co(c2, cmul, c1), nat0, c0)
  syld(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(nat1, cle, c2), wbr(c0, clt, co(c2, cmul, c1)), wbr(c1, cle, co(c2, cmul, c1)))
  ex(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(nat1, cle, c2), wbr(c1, cle, co(c2, cmul, c1)))
  sylan(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(nat1, cle, c2), wbr(c1, cle, co(c2, cmul, c1)), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))
  syl(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))

blocks.name: dvdsle
blocks.content: The divisors of a positive integer are bounded by it. The proof does not use ` / ` . (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 21-Mar-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm dvdsle(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn)), wi(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
} = {
  sylibrd(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
  con2d(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c0))
  3expia(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wn(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1)))
  mtbird(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn), wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c0), c1)))
  nrexdv(hs0, cz, w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn), wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c0), c1))
  neneqd(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c0), c1, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn), wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cz)))
  imp(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn), wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wne(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c0), c1))
  3impia(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wne(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c0), c1)))
  com23(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn)), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wne(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c0), c1))
  3expia(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wi(wbr(c1, clt, c0), wne(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c0), c1)))
  dedth3h(c0, nat1, c1, nat1, cv(hs0), nat1, wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wi(wbr(c1, clt, c0), wne(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c0), c1)), wi(wbr(c1, clt, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz))), wne(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz))), c1)), wi(wbr(cif(c1, nat1, wcel(c1, cn)), clt, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz))), wne(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz))), cif(c1, nat1, wcel(c1, cn)))), wi(wbr(cif(c1, nat1, wcel(c1, cn)), clt, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz))), wne(co(cif(cv(hs0), nat1, wcel(cv(hs0), cz)), cmul, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz))), cif(c1, nat1, wcel(c1, cn)))))
  imbi12d(wceq(c0, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz))), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wne(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c0), c1), wbr(c1, clt, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz))), wne(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz))), c1))
  breq2(c0, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz)), c1, clt)
  neeq1d(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c0), c1, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz))), wceq(c0, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz))))
  oveq2(c0, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz)), cv(hs0), cmul)
  imbi12d(wceq(c1, cif(c1, nat1, wcel(c1, cn))), wbr(c1, clt, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz))), wne(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz))), c1), wbr(cif(c1, nat1, wcel(c1, cn)), clt, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz))), wne(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cz))), cif(c1, nat1, wcel(c1, cn))))

blocks.name: dvdsleabs
blocks.content: The divisors of a nonzero integer are bounded by its absolute value. Theorem 1.1(i) in [ApostolNT] p. 14 (comparison property of the divides relation). (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 21-Mar-2011.) (Proof shortened by Fan Zheng, 3-Jul-2016.)

blocks.name: dvdsleabs2
blocks.content: Transfer divisibility to an order constraint on absolute values. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: dvdsabseq
blocks.content: If two integers divide each other, they must be equal, up to a difference in sign. Theorem 1.1(j) in [ApostolNT] p. 14. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2014.) (Revised by AV, 7-Aug-2021.)

blocks.name: dvdseq
blocks.content: If two nonnegative integers divide each other, they must be equal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2014.) (Proof shortened by AV, 7-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dvdseq(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c1, cdvds, c0))), wceq(c0, c1))

  sylan2(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c1, cdvds, c0)), wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), cfv(cabs, c1)))
  dvdsabseq(c0, c1)
  3eqtrd(c0, c1, cfv(cabs, c0), cfv(cabs, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), cfv(cabs, c1))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), cfv(cabs, c1)), wceq(c0, cfv(cabs, c0)))

blocks.name: divconjdvds
blocks.content: If a nonzero integer ` M ` divides another integer ` N ` , the other integer ` N ` divided by the nonzero integer ` M ` (i.e. the _divisor conjugate_ of ` N ` to ` M ` ) divides the other integer ` N ` . Theorem 1.1(k) in [ApostolNT] p. 14. (Contributed by AV, 7-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:

  adantl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wne(c0, nat0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c0)), c1), wceq(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c0)), c1)))

  zcn(c1)

  simpr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wne(c0, nat0)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1))

thm dvdsflip(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℕ →(c1 : c2 ↔ c2))
  ⊣ c2 = { s0 ∈ ℕ | s0[||]c0 }
  ⊣ c1 =(s1 ∈ c2 ↦(c0[÷]s1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  f1o2d(s1, hs0, c1, c2, c2, (c0[÷]s1), (c0[÷]hs0), c0 ∈ ℕ)
  syl6eleqr((c0[÷]s1), c2, { s0 ∈ ℕ | s0[||]c0 }, (c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ s1 ∈ c2))
  sylan2b(c0 ∈ ℕ, s1 ∈ c2, (c0[÷]s1)∈ { s0 ∈ ℕ | s0[||]c0 }, s1 ∈ { s0 ∈ ℕ | s0[||]c0 })
  eleq2i(s1, c2, { s0 ∈ ℕ | s0[||]c0 })
  dvdsdivcl(s0, c0, s1)

  sylan2b(c0 ∈ ℕ, hs0 ∈ c2, (c0[÷]hs0)∈ { s0 ∈ ℕ | s0[||]c0 }, hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ ℕ | s0[||]c0 })
  eleq2i(hs0, c2, { s0 ∈ ℕ | s0[||]c0 })
  dvdsdivcl(s0, c0, hs0)
  3bitr4g((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧(s1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2)), s1 =(c0[÷]hs0), hs0 =(c0[÷]s1), (c0[÷]hs0)= s1, (c0[÷]s1)= hs0)
  sylan2(c0 ∈ ℕ, (s1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2), ((c0[÷]hs0)= s1 ↔(c0[÷]s1)= hs0), (s1 ∈ ℕ ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ))
  anim12i(s1 ∈ c2, hs0 ∈ c2, s1 ∈ ℕ, hs0 ∈ ℕ)

  sseli(hs0, c2, cn)

  divmul3d(c0, hs0, s1, (c0 ∈ ℕ ∧(s1 ∈ ℕ ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ)))

  nnne0(hs0)

  adantr(c0 ∈ ℕ, (s1 ∈ ℕ ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  nncn(c0)
  ad2antll(c0 ∈ ℕ, s1 ∈ ℕ, hs0 ∈ ℕ, hs0 ∈ ℂ)
  nncn(hs0)
  ad2antrl(c0 ∈ ℕ, s1 ∈ ℕ, hs0 ∈ ℕ, s1 ∈ ℂ)
  nncn(s1)
  ad2antrl(c0 ∈ ℕ, s1 ∈ ℕ, hs0 ∈ ℕ, s1 ≠ 0)
  nnne0(s1)
  eqcom(s1, (c0[÷]hs0))
  eqcom(hs0, (c0[÷]s1))

  id(wcel(c0, cn))
  dvdsle(cv(s0), c0)
  bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), cn), wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0))))
  ibar(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wb(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0))), wcel(c0, cz))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(c0, cz))
  nnz(c0)
  fznn(c0, cv(s0))
  rabss(s0, cn, co(nat1, cfz, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0))

blocks.name: dvds1
blocks.content: The only nonnegative integer that divides 1 is 1. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2015.)

thm dvds1(class c0) {

  mpbid(wcel(c0, cz), wn(wral(s0, cz, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cfv(cabs, c0)))), wrex(s0, cz, wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), clt, cv(s0))))
  mpsyl(wcel(c0, cz), wrex(s0, cz, wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), clt, cv(s0))), wss(cn, cz), wrex(s0, cn, wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), clt, cv(s0))))
  nnssz()
  syl(wcel(c0, cz), wrex(s0, cn, wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), clt, cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(cabs, c0), cr))
  arch(s0, cfv(cabs, c0))
  ssrexv(s0, cn, cz, wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), clt, cv(s0)))
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, cz), wrex(s0, cz, wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), clt, cv(s0))), wn(wral(s0, cz, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cfv(cabs, c0)))), wrex(s0, cz, wn(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cfv(cabs, c0)))))
  rexbidva(s0, cz, wcel(c0, cz), wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), clt, cv(s0)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cfv(cabs, c0))))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wb(wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), clt, cv(s0)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cfv(cabs, c0)))), wcel(cfv(cabs, c0), cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  abscld(c0, wcel(c0, cz))
  zcn(c0)
  zre(cv(s0))
  ltnle(cfv(cabs, c0), cv(s0))
  rexnal(s0, cz, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cfv(cabs, c0)))
  expdimp(wral(s0, cz, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0)), wcel(c0, cz), wne(c0, nat0), wral(s0, cz, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cfv(cabs, c0))))
  syl11(wral(s0, cz, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wne(c0, nat0)), wral(s0, cz, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cfv(cabs, c0))), wral(s0, cz, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cfv(cabs, c0)))))
  ralim(s0, cz, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cfv(cabs, c0)))
  ralrimiv(s0, cz, wa(wcel(c0, cz), wne(c0, nat0)), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cfv(cabs, c0))))
  expcom(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cfv(cabs, c0))))
  3expb(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(c0, cz), wne(c0, nat0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cfv(cabs, c0))))
  dvdsleabs(cv(s0), c0)
  nne(c0, nat0)

thm alzdvds(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℤ →(∀(s0 ∈ ℤ, s0[||]c0)↔ c0 = 0))

} = {

  sylib((∀(s0 ∈ ℤ, s0[||]c0)∧ c0 ∈ ℤ), c0 = 0, ¬ c0 ≠ 0)
  mtod((∀(s0 ∈ ℤ, s0[||]c0)∧ c0 ∈ ℤ), c0 ≠ 0, ∀(s0 ∈ ℤ, s0[≤](abs ` c0)))
  adantl(∀(s0 ∈ ℤ, s0[||]c0), c0 ∈ ℤ, ¬ ∀(s0 ∈ ℤ, s0[≤](abs ` c0)))
  mpbid(c0 ∈ ℤ, ¬ ∀(s0 ∈ ℤ, s0[≤](abs ` c0)), ∃(s0 ∈ ℤ,(abs ` c0)[<]s0))
  mpsyl(c0 ∈ ℤ, ∃(s0 ∈ ℤ,(abs ` c0)[<]s0), ℕ ⊆ ℤ, ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ,(abs ` c0)[<]s0))
  nnssz()
  syl(c0 ∈ ℤ, ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ,(abs ` c0)[<]s0), (abs ` c0)∈ ℝ)
  arch(s0, (abs ` c0))
  ssrexv(s0, cn, cz, (abs ` c0)[<]s0)
  syl6bb(c0 ∈ ℤ, ∃(s0 ∈ ℤ,(abs ` c0)[<]s0), ¬ ∀(s0 ∈ ℤ, s0[≤](abs ` c0)), ∃(s0 ∈ ℤ, ¬ s0[≤](abs ` c0)))
  rexbidva(s0, cz, c0 ∈ ℤ, (abs ` c0)[<]s0, ¬ s0[≤](abs ` c0))
  syl2an(c0 ∈ ℤ, s0 ∈ ℤ, ((abs ` c0)[<]s0 ↔ ¬ s0[≤](abs ` c0)), (abs ` c0)∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ ℝ)
  abscld(c0, c0 ∈ ℤ)
  zcn(c0)
  zre(s0)
  ltnle((abs ` c0), s0)
  rexnal(s0, cz, s0[≤](abs ` c0))
  expdimp(∀(s0 ∈ ℤ, s0[||]c0), c0 ∈ ℤ, c0 ≠ 0, ∀(s0 ∈ ℤ, s0[≤](abs ` c0)))
  syl11(∀(s0 ∈ ℤ, s0[||]c0), (c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c0 ≠ 0), ∀(s0 ∈ ℤ, s0[≤](abs ` c0)), ∀(s0 ∈ ℤ,(s0[||]c0 → s0[≤](abs ` c0))))
  ralim(s0, cz, s0[||]c0, s0[≤](abs ` c0))
  ralrimiv(s0, cz, (c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c0 ≠ 0), (s0[||]c0 → s0[≤](abs ` c0)))
  expcom((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c0 ≠ 0), s0 ∈ ℤ, (s0[||]c0 → s0[≤](abs ` c0)))
  3expb(s0 ∈ ℤ, c0 ∈ ℤ, c0 ≠ 0, (s0[||]c0 → s0[≤](abs ` c0)))
  dvdsleabs(s0, c0)
  nne(c0, nat0)
  ralrimiv(s0, cz, c0 = 0, s0[||]c0)
  syl5ibr(c0 = 0, s0 ∈ ℤ, s0[||]c0, s0[||]0)
  dvds0(s0)
  breq2(c0, nat0, s0, cdvds)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cabs, c0)

  diff.cz.s(s0)

blocks.name: dvdsext
blocks.content: Poset extensionality for division. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm dvdsext(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wb(wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, cn0, wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cdvds, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbid2(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, cn0, wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cdvds, cv(s0)))))
  ralrimivw(s0, cn0, wceq(c0, c1), wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cdvds, cv(s0))))
  breq1(c0, c1, cdvds, cv(s0))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wral(s0, cn0, wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cdvds, cv(s0)))), wceq(c0, c1))
  syl22anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wral(s0, cn0, wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cdvds, cv(s0))))), wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c1, cdvds, c0))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0), wral(s0, cn0, wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cdvds, cv(s0)))))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0), wral(s0, cn0, wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cdvds, cv(s0)))))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wral(s0, cn0, wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cdvds, cv(s0))))), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c1, cdvds, c1))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0), wral(s0, cn0, wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cdvds, cv(s0)))), wbr(c1, cdvds, c1))
  syl(wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(c1, cdvds, c1), wcel(c1, cz))
  nn0z(c1)
  iddvds(c1)
  adantll(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0), wral(s0, cn0, wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cdvds, cv(s0)))), wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c1, cdvds, c1)))
  rspcva(s0, c1, cn0, wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cdvds, cv(s0))), wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c1, cdvds, c1)))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cdvds, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c1, cdvds, c1))
  breq2(cv(s0), c1, c0, cdvds)
  breq2(cv(s0), c1, c1, cdvds)
  mpbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wral(s0, cn0, wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cdvds, cv(s0))))), wbr(c1, cdvds, c0), wbr(c0, cdvds, c0))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0), wral(s0, cn0, wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cdvds, cv(s0)))), wbr(c0, cdvds, c0))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn0), wbr(c0, cdvds, c0), wcel(c0, cz))
  nn0z(c0)
  iddvds(c0)
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0), wral(s0, cn0, wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cdvds, cv(s0)))), wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, c0), wbr(c1, cdvds, c0)))
  rspcva(s0, c0, cn0, wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cdvds, cv(s0))), wb(wbr(c0, cdvds, c0), wbr(c1, cdvds, c0)))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c0, cdvds, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cdvds, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c0), wbr(c1, cdvds, c0))
  breq2(cv(s0), c0, c0, cdvds)
  breq2(cv(s0), c0, c1, cdvds)
  dvdseq(c0, c1)

  diff.wb.s(s0, wbr(c0, cdvds, c0), wbr(c1, cdvds, c0))

  diff.wbr.s(s0, c1, cdvds, c0)

blocks.name: fzm1ndvds
blocks.content: No number between ` 1 ` and ` M - 1 ` divides ` M ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fzm1ndvds(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))), wn(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1)))

  mtod(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wbr(c1, clt, c0))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1))), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))
  elfzle2(c1, nat1, co(c0, cmin, nat1))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))), wb(wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, cmin, nat1))), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, cz))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1))), wcel(c1, cz))
  elfzelz(c1, nat1, co(c0, cmin, nat1))
  zltlem1(c1, c0)
  ltnled(c1, c0, wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))))
  nnred(c1, wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1))), wcel(c0, cr))
  nnre(c0)
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))), wi(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1))), wcel(c0, cz))
  nnz(c0)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1))), wcel(c1, cn))
  elfznn(c1, co(c0, cmin, nat1))
  dvdsle(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: fzo0dvdseq
blocks.content: Zero is the only one of the first ` A ` nonnegative integers that is divisible by ` A ` . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fzo0dvdseq(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1)), wb(wbr(c1, cdvds, c0), wceq(c0, nat0)))
} = {

blocks.name: dvdsmod
blocks.content: Any number ` K ` whose mod base ` N ` is divisible by a divisor ` P ` of the base is also divisible by ` P ` . This means that primes will also be relatively prime to the base when reduced ` mod N ` for any base. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Mar-2014.)

blocks.name: mulmoddvds
blocks.content: If an integer is divisible by a positive integer, the product of this integer with another integer modulo the positive integer is 0. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 30-Aug-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 18-Mar-2022.)

blocks.name: 3dvdsdec
blocks.content: A decimal number is divisible by three iff the sum of its two "digits" is divisible by three. The term "digits" in its narrow sense is only correct if ` A ` and ` B ` actually are digits (i.e. nonnegative integers less than 10). However, this theorem holds for arbitrary nonnegative integers ` A ` and ` B ` , especially if ` A ` is itself a decimal number, e.g. ` A = ; C D ` . (Contributed by AV, 14-Jun-2021.) (Revised by AV, 8-Sep-2021.)
blocks.origin:

The term "digits" in its narrow sense is only correct if ` A ` , ` B ` and ` C ` actually are digits (i.e. nonnegative integers less than 10). However, this theorem holds for arbitrary nonnegative integers ` A ` , ` B ` and ` C ` . (Contributed by AV, 14-Jun-2021.) (Revised by AV, 1-Aug-2021.)

blocks.name: fprodfvdvdsd
blocks.content: A finite product of integers is divisible by any of its factors being function values. (Contributed by AV, 1-Aug-2021.)

thm fprodfvdvdsd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c2, cz))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)

thm fprodfvdvdsd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s0)[||]prod(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s1))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c2 → ℤ))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s0)[||]prod(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s1))), ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s0)[||](prod(s1 ∈(c0 \ { s0 }),(c1 ` s1))[×](c1 ` s0))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, (c1 ` s0)[||](prod(s1 ∈(c0 \ { s0 }),(c1 ` s1))[×](c1 ` s0)))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), (c1 ` s0)[||](prod(s1 ∈(c0 \ { s0 }),(c1 ` s1))[×](c1 ` s0)), prod(s1 ∈(c0 \ { s0 }),(c1 ` s1))∈ ℤ, (c1 ` s0)∈ ℤ)
  fprodzcl(s1, (c0 \ { s0 }), (c1 ` s1), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  syl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), (c0 \ { s0 })∈ Fin, c0 ∈ Fin)
  diffi(c0, { s0 })
  adantlr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈(c0 \ { s0 }), (c1 ` s1)∈ ℤ)
  ffvelrnd(c1, s1, cz, c2, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈(c0 \ { s0 })))
  adantr(w0, s1 ∈(c0 \ { s0 }), (c1 : c2 → ℤ))
  sselda(s1, (c0 \ { s0 }), c2, w0)
  ssdifssd(c0, { s0 }, c2, w0)
  dvdsmul2(prod(s1 ∈(c0 \ { s0 }),(c1 ` s1)), (c1 ` s0))
  ralbidva(s0, c0, w0, (c1 ` s0)[||]prod(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s1)), (c1 ` s0)[||](prod(s1 ∈(c0 \ { s0 }),(c1 ` s1))[×](c1 ` s0)))
  breq2d((c1 ` s0), cdvds, prod(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s1)), (prod(s1 ∈(c0 \ { s0 }),(c1 ` s1))[×](c1 ` s0)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  eqtrd(prod(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s1)), (prod(s1 ∈(c0 \ { s0 }),(c1 ` s1))[×](c1 ` s0)), (prod(s1 ∈(c0 \ { s0 }),(c1 ` s1))[×]prod(s1 ∈ { s0 },(c1 ` s1))), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  fprodsplit(s1, c0, (c1 ` s1), (c0 \ { s0 }), { s0 }, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  sylibr((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), ((c0 \ { s0 })⋂ { s0 })= ∅, ¬ s0 ∈(c0 \ { s0 }))
  neldifsnd(s0, c0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  disjsn((c0 \ { s0 }), s0)
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈ c0, c0 =((c0 \ { s0 })⋃ { s0 }))
  eqcomd(c0, ((c0 \ { s0 })⋃ { s0 }), s0 ∈ c0)
  difsnid(s0, c0)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, c0 ∈ Fin)
  zcnd((c1 ` s1), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ s1 ∈ c0))
  ffvelrnd(c1, s1, cz, c2, ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ s1 ∈ c0))
  adantr((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), s1 ∈ c0, (c1 : c2 → ℤ))
  sselda(s1, c0, c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, c0 ⊆ c2)
  oveq2d(prod(s1 ∈(c0 \ { s0 }),(c1 ` s1)), cmul, prod(s1 ∈ { s0 },(c1 ` s1)), (c1 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), prod(s1 ∈ { s0 },(c1 ` s1))=(c1 ` s0), s0 ∈ c0, (c1 ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  simpr(w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  zcnd((c1 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  ffvelrnd(c1, s0, cz, c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, (c1 : c2 → ℤ))
  sselda(s0, c0, c2, w0)
  prodsn(s1, s0, c0, (c1 ` s0), (c1 ` s1))
  fveq2(s1, s0, c1)
  diff.cdif.s(s1, c0, { s0 })
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.csn.s(s1, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)

blocks.name: fproddvdsd
blocks.content: A finite product of integers is divisible by any of its factors. (Contributed by AV, 14-Aug-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 2-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm fproddvdsd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, cprod(s1, c0, cv(s1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cz))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, cprod(s1, c0, cv(s1)))), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(cres(cid, cz), cv(s0)), cdvds, cprod(s1, c0, cfv(cres(cid, cz), cv(s1))))))
  fprodfvdvdsd(s0, s1, c0, cres(cid, cz), cz, w0)
  mp1i(w0, wf(cres(cid, cz), cz, cz), wf1o(cres(cid, cz), cz, cz))
  f1oi(cz)
  f1of(cres(cid, cz), cz, cz)
  ralbidva(s0, c0, w0, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, cprod(s1, c0, cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(cres(cid, cz), cv(s0)), cdvds, cprod(s1, c0, cfv(cres(cid, cz), cv(s1)))))
  breq12d(cv(s0), cdvds, cprod(s1, c0, cv(s1)), cfv(cres(cid, cz), cv(s0)), cprod(s1, c0, cfv(cres(cid, cz), cv(s1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  eqcomd(cv(s0), cfv(cres(cid, cz), cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cfv(cres(cid, cz), cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cz))
  sselda(cv(s0), c0, cz, w0)
  fvresi(cv(s0), cz)
  prodeq2dv(s1, c0, cv(s1), cfv(cres(cid, cz), cv(s1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  eqcomd(cv(s1), cfv(cres(cid, cz), cv(s1)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)))
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cfv(cres(cid, cz), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), cz))
  imp(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cz))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cz)))
  sseld(cv(s1), c0, cz, w0)
  fvresi(cv(s1), cz)
  diff.cres.s(s1, cid, cz)
  diff.cid.s(s1)
  diff.cz.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

  ⊢ (w0 → ∀(s0 ∈ c0, s0[||]prod(s1 ∈ c0, s1)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ ℤ)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)

  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, s0[||]prod(s1 ∈ c0, s1)), ∀(s0 ∈ c0,((= |` ℤ)` s0)[||]prod(s1 ∈ c0,((= |` ℤ)` s1))))
  fprodfvdvdsd(s0, s1, c0, (= |` ℤ), cz, w0)
  mp1i(w0, ((= |` ℤ): ℤ → ℤ), ((= |` ℤ): ℤ ↔ ℤ))
  f1oi(cz)

  breq12d(s0, cdvds, prod(s1 ∈ c0, s1), ((= |` ℤ)` s0), prod(s1 ∈ c0,((= |` ℤ)` s1)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  eqcomd(s0, ((= |` ℤ)` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  syl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), ((= |` ℤ)` s0)= s0, s0 ∈ ℤ)
  sselda(s0, c0, cz, w0)
  fvresi(s0, cz)
  prodeq2dv(s1, c0, s1, ((= |` ℤ)` s1), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  eqcomd(s1, ((= |` ℤ)` s1), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ s1 ∈ c0))
